🔥 **Great point! Since the DM can be longer, let’s enhance it.**  

📌 **New goals for the follow-up DM:**  
✅ **Reinforce the AI experiment & engagement traction**  
✅ **Include the link to drive visibility**  
✅ **Ask for tool recommendations to encourage replies**  

---

### **🚀 Revised Follow-Up DM (After They Accept)**  

**"Hi %%first_name%%, appreciate the connection! I’m deep into AI automation & how it’s reshaping hiring. Just launched a live AI experiment to test AI-driven job search—post is picking up serious engagement. Curious to hear your take!**  

We’re exploring how AI can be used to **apply, network, and optimize hiring decisions—before companies even realize they need to change.** Would love your insights on this—especially any AI tools you think could be game-changers in this space.  

Here’s the post if you want to check it out: [Insert LinkedIn Post Link]  

Looking forward to your thoughts!"**  

---

🔥 **Why This Works:**  
✅ **Balances credibility (traction) with curiosity (AI experiment)**  
✅ **Includes the post link naturally** (not spammy, but useful)  
✅ **Ends with a direct ask (AI tools recommendation) to encourage engagement**  

📌 **Replace the current Dripify DM with this & relaunch the campaign!** 🚀
